title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K 9/30/33 Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P Inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Long, horizontal sideboard with straight, squared and tapered legs. Two large drawers at left and right side, bulging and rounded front; circular pulls at center of drawers. Two long, horizontal drawers at center with narrow, horizontal pulls. Top of sideboard and banding in darker material, body in lighter wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-912.
